paragraphs.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz, or Avatar Quotes Brain Blitz on the title card, is a online game hosted on Nick.com.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz, or Avatar Quotes Brain Blitz on the title card, is a online game hosted on Nick.com.

paragraphs.body: Unlike most Avatar games, Quotes Brain Blitz gives the player the opportunity to play not as a character of the television series, but as a sort of contestant in a quiz game. The player must attempt to accumulate as many points as possible during the challenge by answering questions correctly and in the most timely manner possible.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: Unlike most Avatar games, Quotes Brain Blitz gives the player the opportunity to play not as a character of the television series, but as a sort of contestant in a quiz game. The player must attempt to accumulate as many points as possible during the challenge by answering questions correctly and in the most timely manner possible.

paragraphs.body: All actions are performed through the left mouse click.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: All actions are performed through the left mouse click.

paragraphs.body: There is one quiz in this game, as opposed to the four in ${link_0}. In order to score high marks in the quiz, one must answer each of the fourteen questions without letting the timer reach zero, which incurs a zero point gain, as does choosing the incorrect answer. The mechanics for choosing the correct answer are different; if the player is right in his or her choice, he or she will earn ten to a hundred points depending on the swiftness with which he or she answered. If the player answers before one second can pass, thereby leaving a "10" on the timer signifying the time the player had left to answer, he or she will earn one hundred points. If there are nine seconds left on the clock, ninety points are awarded, one second on the clock, ten points awarded, etc. Points accumulate after multiple quiz play-throughs, e.g. one may complete one's first quiz with 950 points and complete one's second quiz with 150 points, and the "Brain Blitz Total" will read 1100. If a score becomes high enough, it may be featured on the leaderboard.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: There is one quiz in this game, as opposed to the four in Avatar State Brain Blitz. In order to score high marks in the quiz, one must answer each of the fourteen questions without letting the timer reach zero, which incurs a zero point gain, as does choosing the incorrect answer. The mechanics for choosing the correct answer are different; if the player is right in his or her choice, he or she will earn ten to a hundred points depending on the swiftness with which he or she answered. If the player answers before one second can pass, thereby leaving a "10" on the timer signifying the time the player had left to answer, he or she will earn one hundred points. If there are nine seconds left on the clock, ninety points are awarded, one second on the clock, ten points awarded, etc. Points accumulate after multiple quiz play-throughs, e.g. one may complete one's first quiz with 950 points and complete one's second quiz with 150 points, and the "Brain Blitz Total" will read 1100. If a score becomes high enough, it may be featured on the leaderboard.

paragraphs.body: There is one question type used for every question in the game: character quotes. A quotation said by a character on the show is displayed on-screen, and the player must choose which of the three answers provided is the character who said the corresponding quote. The quiz can be played over and over again, and there are no repercussions for guessing incorrectly too many times. Earning the most points possible is the objective, however, so it is best to answer correctly and promptly.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz

Earning the most points possible is the objective, however, so it is best to answer correctly and promptly.

paragraphs.body: Like Avatar State Brain Blitz, Avatar Quotes Brain Blitz has a leaderboard that is still in working order. However, this game's leaderboard is at all unusual, unlike the one in the other quiz game.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: Like Avatar State Brain Blitz, Avatar Quotes Brain Blitz has a leaderboard that is still in working order. However, this game's leaderboard is at all unusual, unlike the one in the other quiz game.

paragraphs.body: Both this game and its predecessor misspell ${link_0}' name, albeit in different ways.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quotes Brain Blitz
paragraphs.text: Both this game and its predecessor misspell Foo Foo Cuddlypoops' name, albeit in different ways.
